english.segment1: (Verse 1). Brilliant bright, our salvation. Took the fall to hold us up. All the weight of our condition. Lifted away from us
english.segment2: Blessed love, falling under. Sacredness taking hold. Split the air, the sound of thunder. Heaven begins to unfold
english.segment3: (Pre-Chorus). And the nearness of there. Feels more near to here
english.segment4: (Chorus 1). We can feel the breath of the angels. See the walls bend and shake. The skies in a tremble. Let the day wait
english.segment5: To sing the songs of the heavens. See the dawn starts to break. The bonds start to loose so. Feel the earth shake
english.segment7: Inner sense, divine embrace. In the light of all creation. Heaven and earth start to twist
english.segment8: (Pre-Chorus). And the nearness of there. Feels more near to here
english.segment9: (Chorus 2). We can feel the breath of the angels. See the walls bend and shake. The skies in a tremble. Feel the ground break
english.segment10: We hear the songs of the heavens. See the world come awake. The bonds start to loose so. Feel the earth shake
english.segment11: (Bridge). Blood of a Savior. Pushed back the fall. Love of a Healer. Have overcome
